mapper.select: select r.id,r.employee_id, v.name,v.employee_name ,v.visit_date1,v.visit_date2,v.phone_number, v. ,v.company,v.is_checked from Reservation_info r,visitor v,employee e where r.visitor_id = v.id and e.id = r.employee_id order by r.id desc

select r.id,r.visitor_id, v.checked_date,v.name,v.employee_name,v.visit_date1,v.visit_date2,v.phone_number,v.withPerson,v.company,v.is_checked from Reservation_info r inner join visitor v on r.visitor_id = v.id where r.id = #{id}
update Reservation_info set is_checked=#{is_checked} where id = #{id};
